name: PAX_JOURNEY_TO_SERVICE_DEFINITION_MAPPING
description: Defines a mapping relationship between PaxJourneyList and ServiceDefinitionList, where PaxSegmentRefID in PaxJourneyList aligns with BaggageAllowanceRefID in ServiceDefinitionList. This relationship maps passenger journeys to their corresponding baggage allowances.
prompt: Verify that each <PaxSegmentRefID> in <PaxJourneyList> corresponds to a <BaggageAllowanceRefID> in <ServiceDefinitionList>, ensuring a valid mapping between passenger journeys and baggage allowances.
